title: Setting up Angular 7
description: This articles explains how to setup Angular 7 from stratch

content.html: Google just released Angular 7 and it comes with some new features. In this article we see how to setup and run Angular 7 from scratch. This tutorial is for beginners who are new to Angular and who wants to explore all it has to offer.
In this tutorial we will learn how to run a simple Angular 7 application. We will be using Angular CLI tool for development
You will need NodeJS and npm package manage. Follow the link to install NodeJS to you development environment.
You can read more about Node Package manage for more details.
Angular CLI is used to create new projects, generate application and library code. We need to install Angular CLI globally
